article.title: The MARC Sort Program
article.author: Rather, John .Pennington, Jerry G.
article.text: Describes the characteristics, performance, and potential of SKED (Sort-Key Edit), a generalized computer program for creating sort keys for MARC II records at the user's option.. SKED and a modification of the IBM S/360 DOS tape sort/merge program form the basis for a comprehensive program for arranging catalog by computer..
